doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: This platform instances an ARM VersatileExpress with a MIPS Malta

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Peripherals are modeled to the extent required to boot and run Operating Systems such as Linux.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: ARM Development Boards Versatile Express BaseBoard and ARM CoreTile Express A15x2 MIPS Malta User's Manual MD00048-2B-MALTA-USM-1.07.pdf MIPS Malta-R Development Platform User's Manual MD00627-2B-MALTA_R-USM-01.01.pdf CoreFPGA User's Manual MD00116-2B-COREFPGA-USM-01.00.pdf Linux for the MIPS Malta Development Platform User's Guide MD00646-2B-LINUXMALTA-USM-01.03.pdf
